unique_assignments.title: Homework 1
unique_assignments.description: First of the coding-oriented homework series (part of MIT’s Go assignment series). Students implement components of a fault-tolerant, sharded key/value store in Go.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 2
unique_assignments.description: Second of the coding-oriented homework series (part of MIT’s Go assignment series). Continues implementation of the fault-tolerant, sharded key/value store in Go.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 3
unique_assignments.description: Third of the coding-oriented homework series (part of MIT’s Go assignment series). Further development of the fault-tolerant, sharded key/value store system.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 4
unique_assignments.description: Fourth of the coding-oriented homework series (part of MIT’s Go assignment series). Advances the sharded key/value store implementation and fault-tolerance features.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 5
unique_assignments.description: A course-developed continuation of the MIT series (inspired by the University of Washington’s DSLabs). Completes the coding series to build a fault-tolerant, sharded key/value store.

unique_assignments.title: Assignment 0: Collaboration Policy
unique_assignments.description: Read the class policies and resources, and set up your GitHub account in the class’ GitHub Classroom. Not graded but required to bootstrap the course.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 2a (hw2a)
unique_assignments.description: First part of Homework 2 (the coding-oriented Go assignment series). A separate submission/deliverable in the two-part HW2 sequence.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 2b (hw2b)
unique_assignments.description: Second part of Homework 2 (the coding-oriented Go assignment series). A separate submission/deliverable in the two-part HW2 sequence.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 3a (hw3a)
unique_assignments.description: First part of Homework 3. A separate submission/deliverable in the two-part HW3 sequence.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 3b (hw3b)
unique_assignments.description: Second part of Homework 3. A separate submission/deliverable in the two-part HW3 sequence.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 4a (hw4a)
unique_assignments.description: First part of Homework 4. A separate submission/deliverable in the two-part HW4 sequence.

unique_assignments.title: Homework 4b (hw4b)
unique_assignments.description: Second part of Homework 4. A separate submission/deliverable in the two-part HW4 sequence.

unique_assignments.title: Final quiz
unique_assignments.description: In-class final quiz for the course (distinct from the coding homeworks).
